page.title: 12EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: We have a week 1 and a week 2 schedule Not every lesson is changed.We all get 3 lessons of Maths and English a week. Some people may have P.E.once a week, because they do not have a second language. Other subjects include: French,Environment Science,Physical Science,Craft and German or Spanish. Each lesson lasts 1hour 10minutes which is equal to two periods. The sports activites that we do at the Graham School in summer are tennis, netball,hockey,long jump and track events.We also do cricket, football,rugby,rounders and triple jump. The facilities we have are 2 tennis courts, 1 athletics track, 2 long jump pits and 1 triple jump pit, 1 artificial cricket pitch, 1 football pitch and 1 large gym which can be partitioned to make 2 smaller gyms.
